title: We know something you don't... Amazon has a secret outlet, plus a giveaway section for scoring free stuff
text:
The editors at Yahoo Lifestyle are committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. At times, we may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

View photos What will Amazon come up with next? (Photo: Getty Images) More

Amazon just got Amazinger. Why? There’s a secret outlet section. Shhh. And a giveaway page where you can get stuff for free. Surprise!

First let’s start with the giveaways. In an example of pure marketing genius, Amazon features a selection of products you can click to instantly win. If you don’t win, you can still put the item in your cart at a deep discount. Entering to win is free as long as you have an Amazon account. Sometimes you’ll have to watch a 15-second video before entering, but to us that’s a small price to pay for a freebie.

Now onto the outlet. It’s like an overstock warehouse with clickable merchandise. You’ll find thousands of items by category (electronics, beauty, pet supplies, home & furniture and more) and deals on everyday necessities like razors and fancy stuff like watches. For a bargain hunter, it’s truly fantastical.

In true tag-sale style, the offerings are pretty random. A recent glance at the Super Discounts section revealed a dog-wearing-a-sombrero taco holder next to a set of essential oil roller bottles. Not that there’s anything wrong with that.

Just like when you go looking for deals in person, it can take awhile to find a diamond in the rough. So we tracked down the gems for you. But remember, these are mainly overstock items so if you see something you love, click away or someone else might. Below, our wish list.

7 Piece Forged Stainless Steel Knife Block Set (Photo: Amazon) More

55 percent off! At just $22 for seven pieces, you’ll pay about $3 a knife! So just forgo coffee at your favorite shop for a week and you’ve got yourself a brand-new set of German stainless steel knives in an oak block with see-through sides.

Shop it: 7 Piece Forged Stainless Steel Knife Block Set, $22 (was $40), amazon.com

BOYATU Women's Leather Hobo Handbag (Photo: Amazon) More

40 percent off! For 30 bucks you’d expect pleather. Nope, this is the real deal. It features a magnetic top for easy access, a removable pouch plus a zippered pocket and a cell pocket. Bottom studs allow it to stand up all on its own. Such a big girl.
description: Our picks for the 10 best hidden sales on Amazon right now.
